string.text: Body Health System
Body Health System
Text HUD Replacer
(Reloading required) Text version of HUD.
New Limb Penalties feature
(Reloading required) Enabling this activates new penalties feature. Disabling returns old BHS penalties.
New voice for penalties
Enabling this activates new voice during sprint with damaged legs. Disabling returns voice from original mod.
Minimum Leg HP for camera sway penalty
HP of at least one leg must be below this value to play effects. Default slider value of 5 means that effects will play at 4 or less HP. (Movement speed penalty will still be there, for now)
Minimum Leg HP for damage during sprint

Sprint with damaged leg has a chance to deal damage. This slider sets the minimum amount of leg HP needed to play this effect, i.e. if slider is 4 and leg HP is 4 then effect will be active. (Value of -1 disables the feature)
Legs Camera Effects Power
Multiplier of legs penalty for camera effect. Default: 1.0.
Minimum Arms HP for penalties
Summary Arms HP must be below this value to play effects. Default slider value of 10 means that effects will play if both arms have 9 or less HP.
Arms Effects Power
Multiplier for arms penalty effect power. Default: 1.0.
Minimum Head Damage for penalties
Damage needed to play effects. For example, default slider value of 2 means that each headshot damage must be for 2 or more HP.
Head Effects Power
Multiplier for head penalty effect power. Default: 1.0.
New options from the M-BHS system. Leave at default for the preferred way to play the game./n YOU HAVE TO RELOAD THE GAME AFTER CHANGING ANY SETTINGS BELOW
Natural healing
Damaged body parts will heal VERY slowly on their own. Cannot heal over % of your main HP.
Natural and artifact healing speed
Speed up or slow down natural healing and artifact healing. Higher is faster, healing time is divided by this number.
Painkiller grain shader
When you take a medical item with painkiller effect, the screen becomes grainy (same as when you are in a radiation area).
Medkit healing logic
Medkits heal all limbs at once for one HP at a time (easier) OR medkits heal most damaged limb first one HP at a time (Intended default).
Medkits heal all limbs at once
Medkits heal one HP at a time, most damaged limb first
Rebirth healing logic
Rebirth heals all limbs at once for one HP at a time (easier) OR rebirth heals most damaged limb first one HP at a time (Intended default).
Rebirth heals all limbs at once
Rebirth heals one HP at a time, most damaged limb first
Surgery mechanic
Destroyed limbs(Reached 0 HP) require surgery via surgical tools or surgical kit first to be healed. Does not prevent painkillers from working
Surgery tools repair only one limb
Surgery tools repair their set amount of HP instantly and on one limb only. Have to enable this for CMS to be able to heal more than one HP on a limb
Surgery heals by itself (ENABLED IF SPLINTING IS DISABLED BUT SURGERY ENABLED)
Surgery tools heal instead of repairing HP, effectively removing splinting mechanic.
CMS like tarkov
Allows CMS kit to restore limbs to 40% of hp instead of just repairing them to be splinted. Only works for CMS kit.
Broken limb mechanic
Limbs repaired with surgery require a splint first to be healed. Does not prevent painkillers from working.
Bandage is splint
With this option turned on, the bandage fixes a broken limb.
Tourniquet is splint
With this option turned on, the tourniquet fixes a broken limb.
Medkits also splint broken limbs
Medkits ignore broken limb mechanic and heal limbs anyway. Think of this like a splint being contained in a medkit (wow, tarkov).
Sleep healing
Sleeping regenerates damage to limbs. Healing speed and mechanic can be adjusted below. Cannot heal over % of your main HP.
New sleeping heal logic
In original BHS every limb got healed one HP per hour of sleep. This heals most damaged limb one HP at a time per hour(can be adjusted).
Sleeping heal rate
Multiplier for sleep healing rate.
Restore health values to default BHS ones
Restores values to how they were in default BHS. Does nothing but decrease the amount of health steps on the UI.
